hero.headline: Discovering Talent. Activating Regions. Empowering Youth.
hero.subheadline: Hype My Region (HMR) is a merit-based national talent development platform implemented under the governance of JMP4AFRICA.

about.text: Across Ghana, young people are talented, creative, and entrepreneurial—but opportunities are often fragmented, urban-centred or inaccessible. HMR exists to unlock regional talent and enterprise, bridge the gap between skills and opportunity, and create inclusive platforms where youth can be seen, trained, mentored and supported.

auditionProcess.heading: Auditioning for HMR is easy
auditionProcess.subheading: We've made the process simple so you can focus on your talent.
auditionProcess.paymentNote: Payments are non-refundable and confirm intent to participate.
auditionProcess.pwdNote: PWD applicants are exempt from the registration fee and should indicate their status during application.

steps.title: Pay to Participate
steps.desc: Dial *737*689# and follow the prompts to pay the GHS 100 registration fee. (Free for Persons With Disabilities – PWDs). Save your transaction ID to complete your application.

steps.title: Complete. Get Endorsed & Apply
steps.desc: Download and complete the application form, get it endorsed, add a 60-second video and enter your transaction ID before uploading online for verification.

steps.title: Audition & Develop
steps.desc: Present yourself at the scheduled audition venue for assessment and development. Verified applicants will be notified of venue, date and time.

steps.title: Broadcast & Activate
steps.desc: Selected talents advance to Zonal Showcases and may progress to the National Finale, with opportunities for broadcast exposure, mentorship and regional activation.

whyHMR.whyIntro: Across Ghana, young people are talented, creative, and entrepreneurial—but opportunities are often fragmented, urban-centred or inaccessible.
whyItems: Bridge the gap between skills and opportunity
Create inclusive platforms where youth can be seen, trained, mentored and supported
Anchor youth development within communities and local leadership
Equal opportunity regardless of background or location
whyHMR.whatIntro: HMR delivers a multi-phase national program that combines live events, enterprise activation and media production:

marquee.heading: What HMR Seeks
marquee.subheading: HMR welcomes youth-led ideas, talents and enterprise solutions that demonstrate clear potential to create jobs, strengthen communities, and generate measurable social or economic impact at the community, regional or national level.
marquee.footerNote: HMR places priority on impact-driven, bankable ideas and solutions over performance-only or entertainment-focused submissions.

roadmap.heading: Your roadmap to national recognition
roadmap.subheading: Discover how HMR bridges the gap between regional talent and the national stage through a transparent, three-tier merit system applied with consistent standards across all 16 regions.
roadmap.quote: All stages follow the same judging standards nationwide to ensure total fairness and transparency.

stages.title: Open Auditions
stages.desc: Participants audition in their regions before independent judges.

stages.title: Regional (Zonal) Showcases
stages.desc: Top talents from each region perform at zonal showcases.

stages.title: National Finale
stages.desc: Outstanding talents advance to a national stage for final assessment and recognition.

credibility.title: Why is HMR credible?
credibility.footerText: HMR is not just a show. It's a system for discovery, development, and deployment of youth potential.

cta.heading: Ready to join the movement
cta.subtitle: Have a talent or an idea in mind that would place your region above others? Hype My Region is here to bring it to life.
